name: Adibou Aventure: J'Explore le Corps Humain
overview: In Adibou Adventure: I explore the Human Body on DS, the player takes control of the miniaturized ship of Adibou and goes in search of Bouzzy, the greedy monster. In the company of the hero, his new friend Adilia and Robitoc the robot, he explores the human body and pierces all its mysteries!
